text: Gallia is an unincorporated community in Gallia County, in the U.S. state of Ohio. ==History== A variant name was Gallia Furnace. Gallia Furnace was laid out in 1846 when a blast furnace was established there. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Gallia County, Ohio Category:Unincorporated communities in Ohio
title: Gallia, Ohio
